Name: Spring X Elixir
About the game: For More Version DLC INFO: Discord: steam: Game Introduction Unique gameplay X Hot aphrodisiacs Spring X Elixir is a moderate-paced and light turn-based shmups (STG). Its main gameplay is to collect and combine the Five Elements (Metal, Wood, Water, Fire and Earth) to cast spells within the limited True Qi value. Simply hold down your right mouse button and draw a line by dragging the mouse to block bullets and attack targets so that you can defeat the evil spirits! There are over 30 kinds of Five Element combination spells, as well as many unlockable Magic Treasures to help you fight in Spring X Elixir Spring X Elixir presents a modern alchemist girl named Wick Sugar (Xiaoxin Tang), who stumbles upon a mysterious sixth Spring element besides the Five Elements when slaying evil spirits on her cultivation journey. The Spring element, which has an extremely striking hallucinogenic effect, can create a realistic experience. Using this feature, Wick Sugar (Xiaoxin Tang) creates Spring Horny Aphrodisiacs to experience unimaginable pleasure at home.
